macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Dow Jones Sets Fresh Historic High with 2.5% Surge
items.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed at a record high of 50,141 points on Friday, February 6, 2026, gaining 1,232 points (2.52%) as US equities staged a broad-based recovery after earlier tech-led selloffs. The S&P 500 jumped 1.9% and the Nasdaq rose 2.1%, led by semiconductor stocks including Nvidia (8.02%), Broadcom, and AMD.

items.title: Wall Street Opens Lower Following Asian Market Rally
items.summary: US markets opened lower on Sunday, February 8, 2026, with the Dow Jones falling 123 points and the Nasdaq composite declining 0.5%, following a 3.9% surge in Japan's Nikkei index to a record high.

items.title: Stock Market Futures Show Mixed Signals
items.summary: On February 8, 2026, futures contracts showed modest gains with Nasdaq 100 futures up 0.59%, S&P 500 futures up 0.35%, and Dow Jones futures up 0.21% at 7:37 p.m.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Plunges 30% in Worst Week Since 2022, Trading Below $63,000 Amid Crypto Winter Fears
items.summary: Bitcoin has dropped over 30% in its worst week since 2022, falling from $90,000 to around $70,000 or lower, driven by macro risk-off sentiment, quantum computing fears, and exchange incidents, though analysts note much bad news is priced in and long-term holders are buying.[3][4][2]

items.title: Crypto Industry Faces Identity Crisis as Prices Tank and High-Profile Figures Express Frustration
items.summary: Vitalik Buterin and others highlight frustrations amid Bitcoin's 50% tumble, but history shows less painful downturns, with JPMorgan predicting $266,000 long-term and BlackRock ETF holders staying firm.[1]

items.title: TRM Labs Raises $70M Series C at $1B Valuation Despite Crypto Downturn
items.summary: Forensics firm TRM Labs, a Chainalysis rival, secured $70 million in Series C funding led by Goldman Sachs, valuing it at $1 billion even as crypto prices slump.[1]

items.title: Multicoin Capital's Kyle Samani Announces Surprise Departure from VC Firm
items.summary: Prominent early crypto investor Kyle Samani unexpectedly left Multicoin Capital to focus on other tech areas, sparking speculation of a cofounder fallout though he denies it.[1]

items.title: Exchange Fat Finger Error Sends 2,000 BTC Instead of Won, Causing Brief Price Dip to $55,000
items.summary: A major exchange's rewards promotion glitch distributed 2,000 Bitcoin instead of 2,000 won to hundreds of users, briefly crashing Bitcoin to $55,000.[1]

items.title: Newly Released Epstein Files Reveal Emails with Brock Pierce on Early Coinbase Investment
items.summary: Documents from Jeffrey Epstein include communications with crypto figure Brock Pierce regarding an early investment in Coinbase.[1]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Goldman Sachs Tests Autonomous AI Agents for Process-Heavy Work
items.summary: Goldman Sachs is testing autonomous AI agents to handle accounting, compliance, and other process-intensive tasks, marking a step toward AI-driven business operations. This development highlights growing enterprise adoption of agentic AI systems.

items.title: OpenAI Launches Frontier Enterprise AI Platform
items.summary: OpenAI has released Frontier, a new platform to help organizations build, deploy, and manage AI agents as digital coworkers integrated across business systems. It aims to bridge the gap between AI model capabilities and enterprise implementation.

items.title: AI Maps New Brain Neighborhoods Using Machine Learning on Vast Cell Data
items.summary: Researchers at the Allen Institute used a custom machine learning algorithm, CellTransformer, to analyze genetic data from over 10 million cells in mouse brains, identifying novel neural subdivisions in hours. The method promises accelerated neuroscientific discovery and potential application to human brains.

items.title: Chinese AI Models Dominate Open-Source Landscape Amid Western Regulatory Pullback
items.summary: Chinese models like Qwen2 now lead in 175,000 exposed systems globally, as Western labs retreat due to regulations, raising security concerns according to an exclusive study.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Sony Announces State of Play as First Major 2026 Conference
items.summary: PlayStation has officially announced a State of Play event spotlighting third-party games, indie releases, and projects from PlayStation Studios, with rumors of God of War Metroidvania, Bluepoint's original IP, and PC ports like Death Stranding 2. Confirmed title includes Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis, with potential reveals from Capcom, Square Enix, and others.

items.title: Remedy Entertainment Appoints Former EA Exec as New CEO
items.summary: Control and Alan Wake developer Remedy Entertainment has named Jean-Charles Gaudechon, a former EA executive, as its new CEO.

items.title: MTG Arena Releases February 9 Announcements Including Events and Rebalances
items.summary: Magic: The Gathering Arena announced the return of Arena Powered Cube, Alchemy rebalances, Lorwyn Eclipsed Sealed Arena Direct on February 13–15, and upcoming Arena Championship 11 with a $250,000 prize pool.

items.title: Fallout 76 Receives Update Addressing Priority Gameplay Issues
items.summary: Bethesda released update notes for Fallout 76 on February 9, focusing on fixes for issues impacting gameplay, with ongoing investigations for additional problems.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
